label: Metz, Mark A., Daniel H. Janzen & Winnie Hallwachs.  2017. The description of four new species of Struthoscelis Meyrick (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae: Oecophorinae), one from Area de Conservación Guanacaste, northwestern Costa Cica providing the first known biology for the genus, and the discovery of a novel wing morphology in the males. Proceedings of the Entomological Society of Washington 119(3): 442-458.
